field.comment: The logical name for this entry. It can be used to base business logic on.
field.name: name

field.comment: A human readable title for this entry. Intended to be consumed by the end user.
field.name: title

field.comment: A human readable description of the entry, intended target is people managing the masterdata to describe what this entry is for.
field.name: description

field.comment: Operational masterdata is generated at runtime by the operation rather than explicitly defined
field.name: operational

field.comment: You can disable an entry which means it should no longer be used. However, for integrity purposes of historic data it may need to remain.
field.name: disabled
